channel.title: Working Smither(s) and Smelter(s)
channel.description:
I posted this on another forum about 2 days ago... But so far no solution to my question.
Is there a working smelter?
All the fally smelters (That I have, like walktest, supersmelter, etc...) have errors whenever I run them; and I'm not the only one getting them. Perhaps jagex had an update and thus the smelters are outdated, point being, I need a working smelter (in the f2p area :D)
Also, is there perhaps some smithers? I don't believe I have any, and I haven't stumble upon any. If not, could I request one to be made, if it isn't too much trouble? (Again, f2p one(s) please!)
Thanks. :P

item.title: Working Smither(s) and Smelter(s)
item.dc:creator: @hoofdschots hoofdschots
item.description:
@hoofdschots wrote:

I got the same error and i use the supersmelter too

So can someone help us pls

Read full topic

item.title: Working Smither(s) and Smelter(s)
item.dc:creator: @minosu minosu
item.description:
@minosu wrote:

it doesn’t do anything… Wait, brb, I’ll edit in my post from the other forum… (I tried it at both banks and the furnace, it doesn’t do anything, just gibberish messages keep poping up (Three of them for the supersmelter), then the screen just freezes, and while I was on two accounts at the same time, the account which was attempting to use the smelter had logged out, but it’s screen was just blank. White.)

EDIT:
I ran /supersmeltIron() at both fally banks, and at the furnace… The same thing keeps on happening… This message pops up…

java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero
at SuperSmelter.progReport(SuperSmelter.java:124)
at SuperSmelter.doBank(SuperSmelter.java:152)
at SuperSmelter.run(SuperSmelter.java:110)
at AbstractManager.run(AbstractManager.java:55)
at ScriptManager.processScripts(ScriptManager.java:50)
at Bot.notifyScripting(Bot.java:712)
at Bot.postGameLoop(Bot.java:668)
at client.method7(client.java:7493)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:120)
at client.run(client.java:8757)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

And then this other thing that I can’t copy for some odd reason… Then one more patch of gibberish and then my runescape client screen thing freezes and I log out of runescape with my client being blank… and then… It just stays like that…

Read full topic
